name: Microsoft Architecture Center
description: This guide provides best practices and patterns for building applications on Microsoft Azure. It also  provides suggestions for architecting solutions on Azure by using established patterns and practices.

name: AWS Architecture Center
description: Getting started on architecting in AWS? Then check out this source, it provides reference architecture diagrams, vetted architecture solutions, Well-Architected best practices, patterns, icons, and more.

name: Google Cloud Architecture Center
description: Discover reference architectures, guidance, and best practices for building or migrating your workloads on Google Cloud.
